Text.Page:
The place which you came from was attacked by the Argons wasn't it?

Dougal was worried about sending you back there.

Can you tell me what happened there?

Wait... what's that sound?

You hear Omeros's poem in Court of Enlightenment and find out that Verikam has recovered.

As you enter the Sanctuary of Illumination, Verikam thanks you and promises that the Barakas of Highwatch will support the federation.

You show the location Tamur gave you to the teleportal guard and go to the center of the war.

Can't you hear it? I do have a sensitive hearing...

Wait, it's getting louder.

I can't understand a word...it must be Omeros.

Greetings, .

I was reading a poem so that every Baraka in the Black Continent can know that Verikam has recovered.

Go to the Sanctuary of Illumination if you wish to meet him.

Dougal should be there too."Thanks for letting me know."

. Can I have a moment with you? I am a Bard.

I heard from Dougal that Shara is under war. Can you please let me know more about it?"The Argons..."

War with the Argons...
If it weren't for the Iron Rampart, my people would have fought as well.

I should recite a poem of this war, to let my people know.

I would like to help, if it's not too late.

<PCNAME>. I could thank you all day. Thank you for saving Highwatch and rescuing me. We still haven't retrieved the Oriyn's Arcana yet though...<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Don't worry. Help is on the way."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I heard that Sky Cruiser Endeavor is on its way after Dakuryon.

And that beyond the Iron Rampart, creatures called Argons are invading our land.

It's a pity that we can't make use of the Oriyn's Arcana right now, but the Barakas of Highwatch will support the Federation, till the end of this war.

I must get this news to the Commander at once.

The last news I got was that we could lose Khanovar Front any minute now.
Those damn Argons cut out our supply.

Highwatch would be great help."They sure will."

That's right, I need you someplace else.
At the Argon Frontline.

Tamur wanted you to be there as soon as your scout mission was over.

He sent you a letter. Here.
Read while you pack.

Good byes are always hard to do. I knew you'd have to go... but...

I know not much of the Argons, but I do know that you're our rising star.

And just like you've saved us, you'll save those suffering from this war.

I hope we can meet again some day.
Good bye.

. This location is...
I see. Alright. I'll send you right in the center of the battlefield.
Brace yourself. You're going to the Khanovar Front.

I understand.

May triumph be with you always.

Damn these...?
Excuse my language. All the battles going on...

I guess you got Tamur's letter! Have you finished business at the north?"I have."

Welcome to Khanovar! Argons and casualties are our specialties!

The fighting's bogged down at the moment. Speculation runs rampant, but nobody knows why the argons fell back.

You should check in with {@linkcreature:78#1010#Charti}. Good luck.

Greetings . I was told that you were sent to northern Arun. I guess you've returned.

As you can see...things couldn't get worse. We're barely withstanding thanks to the Shariar Fighters.

Go out and head for {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel}. {@linkcreature:248#2001#Tamur} is waiting for you.
